bMoveDirHold.AltName: Handle Move Direction as Long Press
bMoveDirHold.Wiki: Whether to handle the input movement direction as long press

bKeyHold1.AltName: Handle Key [1] Hold as Long Press
bKeyHold1.Wiki: Whether to treat the key to be entered as a long press

bKeyHold2.AltName: Handle Key [2] Hold as Long Press
bKeyHold2.Wiki: Whether to treat the key to be entered as a long press

bKeyHold3.AltName: Handle Key [3] Hold as Long Press
bKeyHold3.Wiki: Whether to treat the key to be entered as a long press

bLifeEndSuccess.AltName: AI Goal Waits For Duration End
bLifeEndSuccess.Wiki: If this is ON, the AI goal will not be successful until the end of its life
